dmca.title: Development Company complains of copied developments
dmca.body:
Dear Sirs

Re: Notice of copyright infringement

I am writing on behalf of my client The Development Company based in the UK who has a website www.thedevco.com. Web on High have built and promoted the website for the The Development Company, who are now the owners of the website.

The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on http://www.efficientapproach.com. The Development Company owns their website, the text, the artwork, the logo's, and the photographs which appear on this website. Including all title tags, meta name descriptions and meta keywords. This duplicate website appears to be having a significant impact on The Development Company's listings in Google.

The owner of the offending web page is [private]@efficientapproach.com but the registrant for the domain name is [private]@yahoo.com

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed
 
Email: [private]@woh.co.uk Tel: +44[private] Fax: +44[private]
